sparql.resourceConnectionsLabels: select distinct * where { { <{URI}> ?prop ?out. FILTER(!isLiteral(?out) || lang(?out)="" || lang(?out)="en") OPTIONAL { ?out rdfs:label ?label. FILTER(lang(?label)="en") } OPTIONAL { ?prop rdfs:label ?proplabel. FILTER(lang(?proplabel)="en"||lang(?proplabel)=""||lang(?proplabel)="en-us") } } UNION { ?in ?prop  <{URI}> OPTIONAL { ?in rdfs:label ?label. FILTER(lang(?label)="en"||lang(?label)="") } OPTIONAL { ?prop rdfs:label ?proplabel. FILTER(lang(?proplabel)="en"||lang(?proplabel)=""||lang(?proplabel)="en-us") } } }

FILTER(lang(?proplabel)="en"||lang(?proplabel)=""||lang(?proplabel)="en-us") } } UNION { ?in ?prop  <{URI}> OPTIONAL { ?in rdfs:label ?label. FILTER(lang(?label)="en"||lang(?label)="") } OPTIONAL { ?prop rdfs:label ?proplabel. FILTER(lang(?proplabel)="en"||lang(?proplabel)=""||lang(?proplabel)="en-us") } } }

description.en: DBpedia is a community effort to extract structured information from Wikipedia and to make this information available on the Web. DBpedia allows you to ask sophisticated queries against Wikipedia, and to link other data sets on the Web to Wikipedia data.
